an10.99:2.1: Durabhisambhavāni hi kho → durabhisambhavāni kho (bj, pts1ed)
an10.99:2.6: uplavissati vā’ti → uppilavissati vā (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
an10.99:6.2: vaṅkakaṁ → vaṅkaṁ (si, pts1ed) | ciṅgulakaṁ → piṅgulikaṁ (sya-all); ciṅkulakaṁ (mr)
an10.99:8.1: Idha kho pana vo → idaṁ padaṁ sya-all potthakesu natthi; voti nipātamattaṁ (aṭṭha.)
